name: Magic Mouth
flavorText: The stone wall grinds as it reshapes into the semblance of dry, cracked lips framing teeth like canting tombstones. “Beware!” it says.
text: You bind a message into a surface you touch. When conditions you set are met, the surface manifests a mouth and conveys your message, discharging the ritual. The mouth appears to be made out of the same material as the surface, but you otherwise decide the mouth’s appearance.
